description:
If you’re planning an outdoor BBQ as part of your adventure, throw in this spice pack that’s especially great for grilling.

  • Includes four popular spice combinations for seafood, steak, and chicken
  • Comes in one container, with a separate compartment for each spice
  • Each compartment has an easy-to-shake flip-top lid
  • Ingredients: Grill and Broil: oregano, basil, thyme, black pepper, parsley. Seafood: mustard, onion, carrots, corrainder, pimento, dill,pepper, laurel, juniper. Pepper Steak: black pepper, salt, paprika, chillies, glutamate. Chicken: salt, paprika, chillies, glutamate, curry
name: Coghlan's Multigrill Spice Pack
